content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the command "google" to search for the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir trail and received several links to websites such as greatruns.com, alltrails.com, and hikingisgood.com, among others.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What is the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. While there is no loop trail around the entire reservoir, there are sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk. The article maps out 8 km of the most suitable running in the reservoir area, with rolling hills and a good starting point at U Sirky beach. Additionally, there are options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, including quiet, low trafficked roads and trails in the Junák hiking area. The article also provides information on bus access and other running routes in the Brno area. However, it does not directly answer the question of what the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir trail is.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
